strapiPost.title: Re-Runway, a special event put on by NWA Fashion Week and Arkansas Arts & Fashion Forum
strapiPost.content: Re-Runway, a special event put on by NWA Fashion Week and Arkansas Arts & Fashion Forum, will be hosted October 16th and the 23rd. It's a chance to watch past seasons of NWA Fashion Week. It will start at 6:30pm and will be located at 214 S Main Street in Springdale and is a free event.
